name: World Map File
summary: Learn about .WLDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Along with paths, WLDX files can also contain tiles, scenery, music boxes, and level entrances present on the map.
NOTE: The PGE Engine has not yet been released but you can edit WLDX files with the PGE Editor.

description: World map file created by Platform Game Engine (PGE) Project, an open source game engine; contains the overhead map of a world; includes paths to different playable levels, which are specified in .LVLX and .LVL files.
